work.summary: I completed a Advanced Training in Cybersecurity focused on real-world projects. Throughout the course, we worked on comprehensive network hardening, from securing endpoint devices such as user PCs to implementing VPNs for interconnecting branch offices. We also covered forensic analysis using specialized tools for data recovery; securing production environments with Docker and Kubernetes, complemented by audits based on OWASP standards; and finally, we carried out ethical hacking exercises, executing controlled attacks with various industry tools.

I actively participated in the development of a cross-platform application using Flutter, collaborating with the development team on design, logic, and usability tasks. This experience allowed me to apply modern mobile development practices, enhance the user experience, and strengthen my technical skills in collaborative environments.

I joined the frontend team to develop key features for a payment web application using React. I contributed to the implementation of reusable components and responsive design, with a strong focus on enhancing the user experience. This experience strengthened my knowledge in frontend development, collaboration with Git, and work within agile methodologies.

Fitting and start-up of inkjet machines for ceramics, tableware, etc., both nationally and internationally. Finding and sort the breakdowns out, electrical, mechanical, ink system or hydraulic, as well as firmware and software. Advice and training to customers on operation and maintenance plans. Ramp-up and commissioning of machinery.

Electrical and mechanical maintenance of the factory, as well as the find out and sort the breakdowns out in the production lines. Carrying out the preventive maintenance plan in the different machines, also making modifications in the electrical panels.

During this period, I was taking English courses in Dublin and Aberdeen (Scotland), which allowed me to significantly improve my language skills. At the same time, I worked as a kitchen assistant, developing multitasking skills in a dynamic environment.
Performing electrical maintenance in the prison facilities, in addition to carrying out new installations. Management of the purchase of materials and warehouse inventory control.

Comprehensive management of the company, including project planning and coordination, staff supervision, and handling of administrative and legal procedures. Developed strong skills in leadership, organization, and decision-making in a dynamic, results-oriented environment.
